title: F**K RIOT
body:
Game 1
ShutYerFartHole: ...
ShutYerFartHole: ing
ShutYerFartHole: omg
ShutYerFartHole: this team
ShutYerFartHole: and this bot wants to talk trash
ShutYerFartHole: dude stfu
ShutYerFartHole: im just chillin
ShutYerFartHole: im just trying to chill and these guys are being jerk offs...
ShutYerFartHole: yo yall need to chill
ShutYerFartHole: im just trying to watch walking dead and play games
ShutYerFartHole: jesus bot
ShutYerFartHole: DUDE I TOLD YOU TO CALM DOWN
ShutYerFartHole: IM NOT GONNA GANK WHEN YOU DIE??
ShutYerFartHole: WTF
ShutYerFartHole: theres no reason to help a sorry bot lane
ShutYerFartHole: and u dont need it?
ShutYerFartHole: gj bot
ShutYerFartHole: nice awareness
ShutYerFartHole: good job
ShutYerFartHole: GOOD JOB
ShutYerFartHole: GOOD JOB
ShutYerFartHole: GOOD
ShutYerFartHole: JOB
ShutYerFartHole: I already told you kids im trying to watch tv
ShutYerFartHole: look at ya, dying for no reason?
ShutYerFartHole: okay cho
ShutYerFartHole: i dont need red
ShutYerFartHole: says you
ShutYerFartHole: says the sad adc
ShutYerFartHole: reportb to plesae
ShutYerFartHole: bot*
ShutYerFartHole: yeah lol
ShutYerFartHole: ....
ShutYerFartHole: so fed..
ShutYerFartHole: says you
ShutYerFartHole: says yall
ShutYerFartHole: says the adc that walke into a shroom
ShutYerFartHole: wtf?
ShutYerFartHole: how did that hit me?
ShutYerFartHole: dude karma stfu
ShutYerFartHole: get drag
ShutYerFartHole: nvm
ShutYerFartHole: no map awareness
ShutYerFartHole: sad
ShutYerFartHole: reported and muted
ShutYerFartHole: report bot
ShutYerFartHole: k
ShutYerFartHole: report cho
ShutYerFartHole: troll and taking camps
ShutYerFartHole: but foreal report bot
ShutYerFartHole: who
ShutYerFartHole: what is that poison???
ShutYerFartHole: jesus
ShutYerFartHole: hey karma maybe if you ward id know where he would be?
ShutYerFartHole: lol
ShutYerFartHole: i mean aint nothing else i can do
ShutYerFartHole: wait
ShutYerFartHole: what!
ShutYerFartHole: lolo i was in our jungle stupid
ShutYerFartHole: bg

Because BOT lane wants to feed and then blame me i'm the bad one? Please riot, review your reports a little better, when 3 people on a team all report 1 player it gets that player banned, but when 1 person has a problem with someone nothing happens, and what exactly did I do wrong?? i didnt know wtf was a bad word? Can you explain this? Get this under control. This is exactly why I wont be playing league anymore. It's came down to little kids controlling this game. SUPER FUN! LET ME REMIND YOU THIS WAS UNRANKED, AND BLIND DRAFT......

replies.body:
Your name is semi appropriate.

You should have just muted and reported at the end of the game instead of joining the flame war.

Things to note;
Asking people to report, telling people that you're going to report them, or threatening people with reports is a no no. The report system will function perfectly fine without lording it about in chat, that's just using the system as a means to attack someone in chat.

The report feature isn't there to win the flame war or to get others to team up on someone. It's there so Riot can remove that other person from the playerbase should their behavior be consistently or extremely bad.

If they were displaying behavior worse than you in that game then they will be held accountable when their account gets flagged. Don't stoop to their level. That just makes both parties guilty.
It's whatever man, I mean things happen and there was no reason for me to get reported really... It's just a bunch of children playing this game now.. Sad..

> It's just a bunch of children playing this game now.

its more like a bunch of idiots which leave their stress out of other players. But good thing riot is aware of this and punish them. {{summoner:11}}

Mute. But dont mute them.. Mute yourself. The fact that this was unranked blind is very sad. Why are you getting so worked up over blind pick? You are the reason you got banned. Not them. You overreacted and turned into a sarcastic asshole. Even though someone feeds, its your obligation to be kind and raise team spirit to try to do better, not lower it and make them feel like shit. You don't know what kind of day they went through. You are overreacting and you need to control your temper or play custom bots. You wont get anywhere yelling or making your fellow summoners feel bad about a game they did bad in. They know just as well as you do that they are not doing good. Do you need to dive into their throat about it? No. Behave yourself. Learn to respect others. Learn to be kinder in a losing situation. Being a good sport gets people honored and recognized

I mean I wasn't being rude to them until they started talking trash to me, they don't know how my day was either, I didn't start talking trash to them, I wish you could see the whole team chat, all they did was talk smack to me.. But I normally mute people anyways...
So you trash talk back? How is that justified?
I mean at first I ignored it and chilled but I didn't really talk trash to them soooo.
"At fist" dude there is no at first. Its either you ignore it or you dont. Its that simple
k

> [{quoted}](name=InfernoFoxxx,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tEE8xunB,comment-id=00030000000000000001,timestamp=2016-10-27T12:02:31.234+0000)
>
> "At fist" dude there is no at first. Its either you ignore it or you dont. Its that simple

Oh humble {{summoner:11}}  gods
Let this summoner be blessed with the power of the /mute all

Your Everyday 
Otaku San
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
XD so true

> [{quoted}](name=ShutYerFartHole,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tEE8xunB,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-27T02:58:45.605+0000)
>
> I mean at first I ignored it and chilled but I didn't really talk trash to them soooo.

only in leauge freind

they ban for gg ez. its piety and negative but hardly abusive and yet they treat it like you are a racist for saying gg ez. you weren't right per-say but you weren't wrong and as ive seen and heard the number one problem with there system is the lack of ability to report in game behavior that isnt chat you can have several games straight of total bullshit and if you chat even once in response you start risking the ban

why? because those who do it once will do it twice
EXACTLY, BECAUSE RIOT IS FULL OF A BUNCH OF BIG ASS TITTY BABIES! XD

honestly normals should have punishments for any behavior other than afk.

i feel u
Thanks man.

First of all, a single report is treated the same as nine when reviewing your account. Being reported multiple times in the same game doesn't matter, its how many games you were reported in that triggers a review.

You weren't banned because three people reported you, you were banned because you were negative and harassed your team all game. You don't have to cuss to be unpleasant to be around. It also does not matter whether you are in ranked or not, you are ruining the experience for just as many other people.

Honestly, if you don't feel like you can handle yourself in a respectable manner around other people, this probably isn't the right game for you. Good luck with whatever you decide to do.

I mean I see what you're saying but like I said I treat others how they treat me. If they want to yell and talk trash im going to talk trash back, half the time I ignored them. I mean those guys weren't going to get banned, and they started it. It's not my fault they fed and blamed me..

Other people flaming does not excuse you for being toxic, you talking back just makes the situation worse for everyone else.

You were not punished for their behavior, you are punished for your behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=ShutYerFartHole,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tEE8xunB,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-10-27T02:52:34.949+0000)
>
> I mean I see what you're saying but like I said I treat others how they treat me. If they want to yell and talk trash im going to talk trash back, half the time I ignored them. I mean those guys weren't going to get banned, and they started it. It's not my fault they fed and blamed me..

and thats why you got banned thats not how riot work and sadly you have to play by there rules like it or not
Well that bs. I didn't know talking trash wasn't allowed in video games. Lol. 4 years ago it wasn't like this...

I like how you use watching tv as your excuse for why you aren't performing as well. I perform better when I'm watching TV. Also, Even if your team is acting stupid, you still have to work with them. And just because you reported someone doesn't mean they'll be banned. It takes a number of reports for Riot to get to work.

I love it when someone with the name "shut your fat hole" comes to Player Behavior & Moderation for sympathy.

In the words of George Washington and the Founding Fathers to the King of the England:

https://media.giphy.com/media/QyDJII5Hj5rYA/giphy.gif
I mean its a name, get over it? Kid.
Calling me kid is a form of discrimination and micro-aggression.
I like how in the title you curse at Riot but then at the end of the post you ask them to please review your case... cuz you clearly aren't toxic or anything...

I don't care about them reviewing the case, I just want people to see that I got reported for total bullshit, I can curse all day and not be toxic. Cursing is in my vocabulary, they're words, people need to get over that. But its all good. :)

I agree with you on those chat logs not being ban-worthy, you are just an ass, but nothing that would ruin my fun cuz I can just mute you. However we all know they don't just look at a couple games, you have probably been punished before, most likely many times. Anyways you can't really be surprised, you understood it was a possibility to get banned and chose to be "toxic" anyways.

Howdy. Looking through your chat log it appears people have missed the point where you ask for a few of your team mates to be reported which can/will get you in trouble. Your logs are indeed tame compared to others but fishing for reports might be what got you the ban. Very unlucky.
I didn't know saying that my team was feeding and being rude and asking for them to report them at the end of the game was frowned upon... But thanks man.
Your name just screams how messed in the head you are.
Good one?

Why can't you understand that you were punished for your actions and your actions alone? Also, it doesn't matter if 3 people report you because riot will take it as 1 report.

and honestly if you really think you did nothing wrong I suggest you re-read your chat logs otherwise I'm glad you're leaving the game.
Eat a d*ck mate.
With a username like that I would have banned you too.
Kk, no sense of humor? Didn't know a bunch of titty babies played this game....
lol
Are you sure your name doesn't have anything to do with it?
I've had the name for over 2 years, but i was thinking that. Lol
And you were super positive telling them how they did a good job
I thought so too.
